title: JBS Tolleson, Inc. Recalls Raw Beef Products due to Possible Salmonella Newport Contamination
summary: EDITORS NOTE: Editors note: This release is being reissued as an expansion of the Oct. 4, 2018 recall. The scope of this recall expansion now includes an additional 5,156,076 pounds of raw beef products, which were produced and packed from July 26, 2018 to Sept...
